mapper.select: select id, name, startdate, enddate, place place_name, poster mainposter, genre, state from festival where state = '공연중' or state = '공연예정' ORDER BY enddate ASC limit 0, 5;
SELECT a.name, a.id, a.mainposter,a.startdate, a.enddate,a.genre, b.showRank FROM showdb as a INNER JOIN popular as b ON a.id = b.showdb_id ORDER BY b.showRank ASC limit 0, 21;
SELECT a.name, a.id, a.mainposter,a.startdate, a.enddate,a.genre, b.showRank FROM showdb as a INNER JOIN popularW as b ON a.id = b.showdb_id ORDER BY b.showRank ASC limit 0, 21;

select count(id) cnt from user
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'

select id, username, role, nickname, img, register_date, tel, gender, birth, zipcode, road_name, addr, agree_to_receive_email, agree_to_receive_msg, route, self_certification, self_certification_num from user
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'

select a.id, a.user_id, a.title, a.content, date_format(a.writedate, '%m-%d %h:%i') writedate, b.name showdb_id ,a.hit from board a inner join showdb b on a.showdb_id = b.id
where b.${searchKey2} like '%${searchWord2}%'
where a.${searchKey2} like '%${searchWord2}%'

select count(a.id) cnt from board a inner join showdb b on a.showdb_id = b.id
where b.name like '%${searchWord2}%'
where a.${searchKey2} like '%${searchWord2}%'
select count(a.id ) cnt from report a inner join review b on a.postNum = b.id where type = 'review';

select a.id, a.user_id, a.type, a.content, b.user_id user_id2,b.content rcontent, b.show_id,c.name genre ,b.order_list_no, a.postnum from report a inner join review b on a.postNum = b.id inner join showdb c on b.show_id = c.id where a.type = 'review'
and ( a.content like '%${searchWord4}%' OR b.content like '%${searchWord4}%' )
and b.content like '%${searchWord4}%'
and ( b.user_id like '%${searchWord4}%' OR a.user_id like '%${searchWord4}%' )
and b.user_id like '%${searchWord4}%'
;

select a.id, a.user_id, a.type, a.content, b.user_id user_id2 ,b.content rcontent, c.name show_id, a.postnum postnum from report a inner join board b on a.postNum = b.id inner join showdb c on b.showdb_id = c.id where a.type = 'meet'
and ( a.content like '%${searchWord5}%' OR b.content like '%${searchWord5}%' )
and b.content like '%${searchWord5}%'
and ( b.user_id like '%${searchWord5}%' OR a.user_id like '%${searchWord5}%' )
and b.user_id like '%${searchWord5}%'
;

select a.chat_room_id, a.update_date, b.username from chatlist a inner join user b on a.send_user_id = b.id order by a.update_date
;

select a.id, a.user_id, b.name, a.order_list_no, a.content, date_format(a.writedate, '%Y.%m.%d %h:%i') writedate
, a.rate, a.viewdate from review a inner join showdb b on b.id = a.show_id
where a.content like '%${searchWord3}%'
where a.user_id like '%${searchWord3}%'
where b.name like '%${searchWord3}%'
;
select count(a.id ) cnt from report a inner join board b on a.postNum = b.id where type = 'meet';
